```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
library(robotstxt)
paths_allowed("http://www.imdb.com")
```

```{r imdb_top_250}
page <- read_html("http://www.imdb.com/chart/tvmeter")
titles <- page %>%
  html_nodes(".titleColumn a") %>%
  html_text()
years <- page %>%
  html_nodes(".secondaryInfo") %>%
  html_text() %>%
  str_replace("\\(", "") %>% # remove (
  str_replace("\\)", "") %>% # remove )
  as.numeric()
scores <- page %>%
  html_nodes("strong") %>%
  html_text() %>%
  as.numeric()
imdb_top_250 <- data_frame(
  title = titles, 
  year = years, 
  score = scores[5:254]
  )
imdb_top_250 <- imdb_top_250 %>%
  mutate(
    rank = 1:nrow(imdb_top_250)
  )
```

# Cual peliculas de 1995 son en la lista?

```{r}
imdb_top_250 %>%
  filter(year == 1995)
```

# Cual ano tiene el mas peliculas en esta lista?

```{r}
imdb_top_250 %>% 
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(total = n()) %>%
  arrange(desc(total)) %>%
  head(5)
```

# La promedia de score por ano

```{r}
imdb_top_250 %>% 
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(avg_score = mean(score)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(y = avg_score, x = year)) +
    geom_point() +
    geom_smooth(method = "lm") +
    xlab("year")
```
